thread.title: La La Land Wins Best Original Song And Score Golden Globes
thread.title_full: La La Land Wins Best Original Song And Score Golden Globes

author: Stereogum
title: La La Land Wins Best Original Song And Score Golden Globes
text: La La Land, which was parodied in the Golden Globes' opening musical number , is winning big at tonight's ceremony. The Emma Stone- and Ryan Gosling-starring musical has won Golden Globes for Best Original Score and Best Original Song (for the song "City Of Stars."), and composer Justin Hurwitz accepted the awards along with "City … More »
